entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Who cares about your opinion about Biden!  Deal with the important issues like eliminating the Coronavirus.  It’s killing thousands of good Americans.  Stop dealing with statues of dead people being torn down.  It’s not about you it’s about the American citizens!
